gettingStartedDesc1: Welcome to the Campaign Manager! This guide will help you create effective marketing campaigns that engage your audience and drive results.
gettingStartedDesc2: Follow the steps below to create your first campaign. Each step is designed to help you craft compelling content that resonates with your target audience.
step1Desc: Start by defining your campaign's name, description, target audience, and platform. Be specific about who you're trying to reach and what you want to achieve.
step2Desc: Our AI will generate theme options based on your campaign details. Choose the one that best fits your brand identity and campaign goals.
step3Desc: Generate post content based on your campaign and selected theme. Review and approve the posts that best communicate your message.
step4Desc: Generate images for your approved posts and schedule them for publication. Our system will automatically post them at the optimal times for engagement.
step5Desc: Track your campaign's performance through our analytics dashboard. Monitor engagement metrics, reach, and conversion rates to optimize future campaigns.
